title: Nessa no Haou Gandalla (Gandalla: The King of Burning Desert)
synopsis: A dispute between young band members and an unfortunate choice of melody inadverdently draws them all into the demonic horror known as  the desert-god Gandalla.
voices: ['Komatsu, Rika', 'Matsumoto, Yasunori', 'Morikawa, Toshiyuki', 'Sasamoto, Yuuko', 'Yuasa, Kaori', 'Touma, Yumi', 'Tobita, Nobuo', 'Yao, Kazuki', 'Suzuki, Reiko', 'Uemura, Noriko']
staff: [['Matsuura, Noriyoshi', ['Sound Director']], ['Kawase, Toshifumi', ['Episode Director']], ['Ueda, Hidehito', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard', ' Chief Animation Director']], ['Takada, Jun', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard']]]
